sentences.en: A record 65 expeditions are expected at Mount Everest this season.
sentences.cn: 今年的攀登季节,创记录的65个探险队将会来到珠峰.

sentences.en: Climbing Mt. Everest is anything but a pleasure trip.
sentences.cn: 登圣母峰绝不是一次轻松的旅途.

sentences.en: Everest is the highest mountain in the world.
sentences.cn: 埃佛勒斯(即珠穆朗玛)峰是世界上最高的山.
埃佛勒斯峰?即珠穆朗玛峰?有多高?

sentences.en: Many mountaineers go up mt . Everest but not all summit.
sentences.cn: 许多登山者攀登珠穆朗玛峰,但不是所有的人都登上了顶峰.

sentences.en: Mount Everest could be seen in the distance.
sentences.cn: 远远地可以看到埃非尔士峰(即珠穆朗玛峰).

sentences.en: My brother was once a member of the mount Everest Expedition.
sentences.cn: 我弟弟曾是珠穆朗玛峰登山队的队员.

sentences.en: The climbers reached the summit of Mount Everest yesterday morning.
sentences.cn: 登山者于昨日早晨登上珠穆朗玛峰的顶峰.

sentences.en: the first ascent of Mount Everest
The holes in the facade form a huge reproduction of Mount Everest.
sentences.cn: 上面的孔像喜马拉雅山巨大的复制品.

sentences.en: The intimidating bulk of Mt Everest rose up before the climbers.
sentences.cn: 登山者面前耸立着险峻的埃佛勒斯峰.

sentences.en: The top of Mount Everest is the most inaccessible place in the world.
sentences.cn: 珠穆朗玛峰是世界上最难到达的地方.

sentences.en: They would attempt the mount of Everest in the morning.
sentences.cn: 他们将在早上尝试攀爬珠穆朗玛峰.

sentences.en: This photo was taken on the way to Everest Base Camp.
sentences.cn: 照片摄于正在去珠峰大本营的路上.

phrases.tran_cn: 埃佛勒斯峰（喜马拉雅山主峰之一，中国称珠穆朗玛峰）

trans.tran_cn: 珠穆朗玛峰（世界最高峰）
